SELECT /* BrandshopMapper.XML, selectBrandshop, seung hun Lee, 2014-02-19 */ TOTAL_COUNT , BRAND_ID , BRAND_SHOP_NM , CATEGORY_NO , MENU_NM , LOG_IMG_POS , BNR_IMG_SIZE , EXPO_ORD FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) OVER () AS TOTAL_COUNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.CATEGORY_NO, A.EXPO_ORD) RNUM , A.BRAND_ID , A.BRAND_SHOP_NM , A.CATEGORY_NO , (SELECT MENU_NM FROM TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_DESC WHERE MENU_ID = A.CATEGORY_NO AND LANG_CD = 'ko' AND ROWNUM = 1) AS MENU_NM , A.LOG_IMG_POS , A.BNR_IMG_SIZE , A.EXPO_ORD FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT BS.BRAND_SHOP_NO AS BRAND_ID , BS.BRAND_SHOP_NM , BS.CATEGORY_NO , CONCAT( BS.BNR_IMG_PATH, BS.BNR_IMG_NM ) AS LOG_IMG_POS , BS.BNR_IMG_SIZE , BS.EXPO_ORD FROM TB_DP_BRAND_SHOP BS , TB_DP_BRAND_SHOP_SELLER BSS , TB_DP_BRAND_SHOP_DVC BSD , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP A , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG B , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY C , TB_DP_PROD D , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD E , TB_CM_DEVICE F , TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE G , TB_DP_PROD_DESC H WHERE 1=1 AND BS.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND BSS.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND BSD.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND BS.BRAND_SHOP_NO = BSS.BRAND_SHOP_NO AND BS.BRAND_SHOP_NO = BSD.BRAND_SHOP_NO AND BS.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND BS.DEL_YN = 'N' AND BSS.MBR_NO = D.SELLER_MBR_NO AND A.PART_PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID
AND #{topMenuId} = ( select ADD_FIELD_01 FROM TB_CM_CD where cd_id = BS.CATEGORY_NO )
AND A.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND D.PROD_ID = H.PROD_ID AND BS.TENANT_ID = E.TENANT_ID AND BSD.DVC_TYPE_CD = F.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND F.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = 'SHV-E230S' AND F.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = G.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND F.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.PART_PROD_ID = G.PROD_ID AND DECODE( D.TOP_MENU_ID , 'DP13' , DECODE( F.EBOOK_SPRT_YN , 'Y' , DECODE( D.META_CLSF_CD , 'CT24' , DECODE( F.MAGAZINE_SPRT_YN, 'Y', 1, 0 ) , 'CT26' , DECODE( F.MAGAZINE_SPRT_YN, 'Y', 1, 0 ) , 1 ) , 0 ) , 'DP14' , DECODE( F.COMIC_SPRT_YN , 'Y', 1 , 0 ) , 'DP16' , DECODE( D.META_CLSF_CD , 'CT25' , DECODE( F.MUSIC_SPRT_YN, 'Y', 1, 0) , 1 ) , 1 ) = 1 AND ( CASE WHEN D.TOP_MENU_ID IN ( 'DP17', 'DP18' ) THEN ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_DP_SUB_CONTENTS SC WHERE SC.PROD_ID = A.PART_PROD_ID AND SC.SALE_YN = 'Y' AND DECODE( F.HDV_SPRT_YN , 'PD005201' , DECODE ( SC.DP_PG_QULT_CD , 'PD009701', 1 , 'PD009702', 1 , 0) , DECODE( SC.DP_PG_QULT_CD , 'PD009701', 1 , 0 ) ) = 1 AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) ELSE 1 END ) = 1 AND ( CASE WHEN D.TOP_MENU_ID IN ( 'DP17', 'DP18' ) THEN DECODE( F.VIDEO_DRM_SPRT_YN , 'N' , DECODE( NVL( D.DRM_YN, 'N' ), 'N', 1, 0 ) , 'Y' , 1 ) ELSE 1 END ) = 1 ) A ) ORDER BY RNUM

SELECT /* BrandshopMapper.XML, selectBrandshop, seung hun Lee, 2014-02-28 */ TOTAL_COUNT , PROD_ID , TOP_MENU_ID , MENU_ID , PART_PROD_ID , UPD_DT , META_CLSF_CD , SVC_GRP_CD , CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , PROD_NM FROM ( SELECT B.TOTAL_COUNT , ROWNUM AS RNUM , B.PROD_ID , B.TOP_MENU_ID , B.MENU_ID , B.PART_PROD_ID , B.UPD_DT , B.REG_DT , B.META_CLSF_CD , B.SVC_GRP_CD , B.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , B.PROD_NM , B.PRCHS_CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) OVER () AS TOTAL_COUNT , A.PROD_ID , A.TOP_MENU_ID , A.MENU_ID , A.PART_PROD_ID , A.UPD_DT , A.REG_DT , A.META_CLSF_CD , A.SVC_GRP_CD , A.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , A.PROD_NM , A.PRCHS_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT D.PROD_ID AS PROD_ID , C.TOP_MENU_ID , C.MENU_ID , A.PART_PROD_ID , D.UPD_DT , D.REG_DT , D.META_CLSF_CD , D.SVC_GRP_CD , D.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , H.PROD_NM , I.PRCHS_CNT , ROW_NUMBER( ) OVER ( PARTITION BY D.PROD_ID ORDER BY D.REG_DT DESC) AS RN FROM TB_DP_BRAND_SHOP BS , TB_DP_BRAND_SHOP_SELLER BSS , TB_DP_BRAND_SHOP_DVC BSD , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP A , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG B , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY C , TB_DP_PROD D , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD E , TB_CM_DEVICE F , TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE G , TB_DP_PROD_DESC H , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_STATS I WHERE 1=1 AND BS.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND BSS.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND BSD.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND I.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND BS.BRAND_SHOP_NO = #{brandshopId} AND BS.BRAND_SHOP_NO = BSS.BRAND_SHOP_NO AND BS.BRAND_SHOP_NO = BSD.BRAND_SHOP_NO AND BS.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND BS.DEL_YN = 'N' AND BSS.MBR_NO = D.SELLER_MBR_NO AND A.PART_PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND D.PROD_ID = H.PROD_ID AND D.PROD_ID = I.PROD_ID AND BS.TENANT_ID = E.TENANT_ID AND BSD.DVC_TYPE_CD = F.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND F.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND G.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND F.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.PART_PROD_ID = G.PROD_ID AND DECODE( D.TOP_MENU_ID , 'DP13' , DECODE( F.EBOOK_SPRT_YN , 'Y' , DECODE( D.META_CLSF_CD , 'CT24' , DECODE( F.MAGAZINE_SPRT_YN, 'Y', 1, 0 ) , 'CT26' , DECODE( F.MAGAZINE_SPRT_YN, 'Y', 1, 0 ) , 1 ) , 0 ) , 'DP14' , DECODE( F.COMIC_SPRT_YN , 'Y', 1 , 0 ) , 'DP16' , DECODE( D.META_CLSF_CD , 'CT25' , DECODE( F.MUSIC_SPRT_YN, 'Y', 1, 0) , 1 ) , 1 ) = 1 AND ( CASE WHEN D.TOP_MENU_ID IN ( 'DP17', 'DP18' ) THEN ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_DP_SUB_CONTENTS SC WHERE SC.PROD_ID = A.PART_PROD_ID AND SC.SALE_YN = 'Y' AND DECODE( F.HDV_SPRT_YN , 'PD005201' , DECODE ( SC.DP_PG_QULT_CD , 'PD009701', 1 , 'PD009702', 1 , 0) , DECODE( SC.DP_PG_QULT_CD , 'PD009701', 1 , 0 ) ) = 1 AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) ELSE 1 END ) = 1 AND ( CASE WHEN D.TOP_MENU_ID IN ( 'DP17', 'DP18' ) THEN DECODE( F.VIDEO_DRM_SPRT_YN , 'N' , DECODE( NVL( D.DRM_YN, 'N' ), 'N', 1, 0 ) , 'Y' , 1 ) ELSE 1 END ) = 1 ) A WHERE A.RN = 1 ) B
ORDER BY B.REG_DT DESC
ORDER BY B.PRCHS_CNT DESC , B.REG_DT DESC
) C WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{offset} AND (#{offset}+#{count}-1)
